relation.text: 14 years of Age , and in such a barbarous manner , that the like hath scarce been heard
were going by Nortnumberland-House , in the Strand , on the first of December
was committed on the 19th of February
was thrown into a Closet , and set Fire , to a parcel of foul Linnen that was now
founded away as dead , and in a short time
had been lawfully Married , the former of which , viz . Elizabeth Toogood had been his Wife for several years
